mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_adviser ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, phone, email, state, image_url, region_id) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, 'ENABLED', #{imageUrl}, #{regionId});
